title: EBSI Verifiable Accreditation Record
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Accreditation

termsOfUse.description: Contains accreditation information about the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: References the Verifiable Accreditation stored as an attribute on the Trusted Issuer Registry (TIR)

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the Verifiable Attestation

authorisationClaims.description: Defines a list of claims that define/determine the authorisation of an Issuer to issue certain types of VCs

authorisedSchemaId.description: Schema, registered in Trusted  Schemas Registry, which the accredited organisation is allowed to issue, as per their accreditation

limitJurisdiction.description: Defines the jurisdiction for which the accreditation is valid
